text:
Allergens: Your health and safety are very important to us. Please be advised that our food may contain or come into contact with common allergens, such as peanuts, soybean, eggs, dairy, wheat, sesame seeds, fish or shellfish. Please alert your server of any food allergies before ordering.

Gluten Free Available Mild Spicy Vegetarian S&S

Noodle Bowl - Bun Thit Nuong
Our famous noodle bowls with rice noodles, fresh lettuce, pickled carrot and daikon, cucumber, beansprout, cilantro, topped with crushed peanut, Vietnamese fish sauce dressing, one cut spring roll.

N1. Grilled Pork | $19.5
N2. Beef | $19.5
N3. Chicken | $19.5
N4. Shrimp | $22.5
N5. Tofu (with veggie spring roll) | $19.5
N6. Special (pork, chicken, and beef) | $24.5
(All ingredients in our noodles bowls are gluten-free, except for Spring rolls are in the same deep-fryer with some gluten products).
Gluten Free Available

Appetizers
A1. Salad Rolls x 2 | $10.5
Fresh soft rolls with lettuce, cucumber, cilantro, rice noodles, shrimp, and grilled pork, wrapped in rice papers, hoisin garlic dipping sauce topped with peanut.

A2. Spring Rolls x 2 | $10.5
Crispy goodness! Ground pork, cabbage, carrot, glass noodles, potatoes, egg & Vietnamese fish dipping sauce.

A3. Veggie Spring Rolls x 2 | $10.5
Crispy vegetarian spring rolls with carrots, cabbage, glass noodles and potatoes, served with house-made sweet soy sauce.
Vegetarian

A4. Crispy Wontons (pork)
served with Sweet & Sour Sauce
Small (12pc) | $10.5
Large (18pc) | $15.5

A5. Shrimp Rolls x 6 | $13.5
Crispy Shrimp egg rolls with Chili mayo dip.

S1. Wonton BBQ Soup | $10.95
Wontons, sliced BBQ Pork, green onion in our flavorful pork consomme soup.

S2. Wonton Greens Soup | $10.95
Wontons, mixed vegetables, green onion in pork consomme soup.

Pho - Beef Noodle Soup
Our signature beef noodle soup with flat rice noodles, sliced onion, fresh herbs in a flavorful aromatic beef broth, served with a side of bean sprout, hoisin sauce, sriracha and lime.

F1. Pho Tai – Rare Beef Pho | $19.5
F2. Pho Nam – Well-Done Beef Brisket Pho | $19.5
F3. Pho Bo Vien – Beef Ball Pho | $19.5
F4. Pho Dac Biet – Special Pho (all of the above) | $22.5


Rice Bowl - Com Thit Nuong
Gluten Free
Jasmine rice, fresh lettuce, pickled carrot and daikon, cucumber, beansprout, cilantro, your choice of grilled meat and a Sunny-side-up egg, served with our signature fish sauce dressing.

Grilled Pork | $19.5
Beef | $19.5
Chicken | $19.5
Shrimp | $22.5
Tofu | $19.5
Special (pork, chicken, and beef) | $24.5

House Special - Bonbon Chicken Wings
Crispy dry coated chicken wings, served with lemon wedges and Sweet & Sour sauce.

8 wings | $15.95

12 wings | $22.95

Banh Mi
Our signature crunchy baguette filled with cucumber, pickled carrot and daikon, cilantro, kewpie mayo, jalapenos, and our secret sauce.
Mild Spicy

B1. Grilled Pork | $13.5

B2. Chicken | $13.5
B3. Beef | $13.5
B4. Banh Mi Combo (Any Banh Mi + French Fries) | $19.5



Noodles
E1. Pad Thai
Tofu | $18.5
Chicken | $20.5
Shrimp | $23.5
Stir-fried fresh rice noodles with fried tofu, egg, carrots, bean sprouts in a sweet and sour tamarind sauce, garnished with crushed peanut, lime and cilantro.
Mild Spicy

E2. Saigon Noodles | $22.5
Stir-fried rice noodles, chicken, tofu, carrot, napa, beansprout, fried onion, cilantro in light soy sauce.

E3. Singapore Noodles | $25.5
Curry stir-fried rice noodles with chicken, BBQ pork, shrimp, egg, carrots, bell peppers, bean sprouts and mushroom.

E4. Shanghai Noodles | $25.5
Stir-fried broad wheat noodles with chicken, BBQ pork, shrimp, carrots, bell peppers, bean sprouts, cabbage, and mushroom in a flavorful sweet soy sauce.

E5. Szechuan Udon Noodles
Chicken/Beef /BBQ pork | $23.5
Shrimp/Tofu | $25.5
Special (Chicken, Shrimp & BBQ Pork) | $27.5
Stir-fried udon noodles with carrots, bell peppers, mushroom, corn in our special Szechuan sauce.
Mild Spicy

E6. Lo Mein – Mi Xao Mem
Chicken/Beef /BBQ pork | $22.5
Shrimp/Tofu | $24.5
Special (Chicken, Shrimp & BBQ Pork) | $26.5
Savory stir-fried soft egg noodles with napa, carrots, broccoli, mushroom, corn.

Stir-Fried (Served with Rice)
T1. Orange Chicken | $24.5
Crispy fried chicken, bell peppers and onion tossed in our tangy orange sauce and garnished with spring onion.

T2. Kung Pao Chicken | $24.5
Crispy fried chicken, bell peppers and onion tossed with our flavorful savory, sweet and spicy sauce.
Mild Spicy

T3. General Tao Chicken | $24.5
Crispy fried chicken, bell peppers and onion tossed in our signature sweet and sour sauce.
S&S

T4. Mixed Greens
Chicken / Beef / BBQ Pork | $18.5
Veggie | $16.5
Shrimp / Tofu | $20.5
Special | $22.5
Stir-fried broccoli, onion, carrots, corn, napa, mushroom.
Gluten Free Available | Vegetarian Available

T5. Curry Mixed Greens
Chicken / Beef / BBQ Pork | $19.5
Veggie | $17.5
Shrimp / Tofu | $21.5
Special (BBQ Pork, Chicken, Shrimp) | $23.5
Curry stir-fried broccoli, carrots, napa, mushroom, onion, baby corn.
Gluten Free Available | Vegetarian Available

T6. Sate Mixed Greens
Chicken/Beef / BBQ Pork | $19.5
Veggie | $17.5
Shrimp / Tofu | $21.5
Special (BBQ Pork, Chicken, Shrimp) | $23.5
Stir-fried broccoli, carrots, napa, mushroom, onion with sate sauce (Vietnamese chili paste).
Gluten Free Available | Vegetarian Available | Mild Spicy

Rice
R1. Fried Rice
White rice, eggs, onion, garlic and soy sauce.
Plain | $11.5
Veggie (no egg) | $12.5
Chicken | 13.5
BBQ Pork | $13.5
R2. Special Fried Rice | $18.5
Fried rice with chicken, BBQ pork, shrimp, mushroom, bean sprouts.

R3. Szechuan Fried Rice | $19.5
Sezchuan styled ( savory and spicy) fried rice with shrimp, egg, carrots, peas, sweet corn and crispy fried onions.
Mild Spicy

Soups
S3. Tomyum Noodle Soup | $22.5
Hot and sour clear soup with rice noodles, chicken, shrimp, mushroom, onion, beansprout, fresh cilantro, lime leaf.

Mild Spicy
S4. Special Wonton Soup | $21.5
Our deluxe wonton soup with wontons, egg noodles, BBQ pork, shrimp, napa, carrot, broccoli, mushroom, spring onion in pork consommé.

S5. Beef Udon Soup | $22.5
Udon noodles, beef, napa, carrots, broccoli, beef, fried onion, spring onion in our flavorful broth.

Sides & Extras
Egg Noodles or Rice Noodles | $5
Steamed White Rice | $3.5
S&S Sauce / Hot Sauce / Sate Sauce / Fish Sauce | $2

Kid's Meal
Chicken Nuggets and French Fries | $12.5
Chicken Fingers and French Fries | $12.5

Beverages
Soft Drinks | $2.95
7up, Coke/Diet, Pepsi/Diet, Root Beer, Brisk, Ginger Ale

Energy Drinks | $4.25
Red Bull, Monster Energy

Vietnamese Coffee (Hot/Iced) | $4.95

Beer & Wine
Available for Dine-in only. Please see our Dine-in Menu for more information!

Choice of noodle bowls: Pork|Chicken|Beef|Tofu

Shrimp: + $3 per bowl

Special (Beef, Chicken & Pork): + $5 per bowl
